long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows users to quickly view years of experience required for job postings on LinkedIn. It provides an easy-to-see badge with the years of experience and includes a button to copy the entire job description to the clipboard.
